tags: Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4
summary: Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4
title: Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4
body:
CD Projekt tiene la solución para hacer un poco más amena la larga espera para Cyberpunk 2077. Aunque el juego llegará hasta principios del 2020, mientras puedes disfrutar de un tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 a través de la PlayStation Store. El tema incluirá un fondo, íconos, sonidos y música inspirados en el juego. No […]

La entrada Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4 aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

summary: Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4
title: Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4
body:
Se libera tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 para PS4

CD Projekt tiene la solución para hacer un poco más amena la larga espera para Cyberpunk 2077.

Aunque el juego llegará hasta principios del 2020, mientras puedes disfrutar de un tema gratuito de Cyberpunk 2077 a través de la PlayStation Store.

El tema incluirá un fondo, íconos, sonidos y música inspirados en el juego.

No se sabe si la oferta es por tiempo limitado, así que, ¿por qué esperar?

Cyb…

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 PS4 Theme Available for FREE on PS Store
title: Cyberpunk 2077 PS4 Theme Available for FREE on PS Store
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 PS4 Theme Available for FREE on PS Store #GamingPH #Cyberpunk2077

It’s time to change your PS4 theme, as the upcoming game Cyberpunk 2077 just released a new theme for Playstation 4. The good news is, it’s free for United States, Europe and Japan PSN Store. The new theme is titled Mercenary of the Dark Future Cyberpunk 2077.

With its simple-looking design, you’ll get the first vibe of the game with their new icons and dark futuristic music background. If…

summary: The more I see about the oncoming game Cyberpunk 2077, the more I’m freaking hyped up.
title: The more I see about the oncoming game Cyberpunk 2077, the more I’m freaking hyped up.

summary: I can’t believe people out are out there saying cyberpunk can’t be transphobic. No genre is immune to perpetuating...
body:
I can’t believe people out are out there saying cyberpunk can’t be transphobic. No genre is immune to perpetuating discrimination and this medium article has some examples to show how present transmisogyny is in it.

(Unless you are a trans woman, I don’t want to hear “but I’m trans and I don’t find it offensive.”)

reblog.comment:

blog.name: renegad3spectre
blog.title: lots of bullshit - drawings - depressive shit
blog.description:
.
(current unhappy crush: V and my baby Soap MacTavish)
((icon part of a commission drawn by lelelego))

summary: the idea came, when I thought of my sister in hospital a few years ago. I went to a shop before and got her coloured pencils and...
caption:
the idea came, when I thought of my sister in hospital a few years ago. I went to a shop before and got her coloured pencils and one of those meditation drawing books.
Because of painkillers she wasn’t really able to draw so I snuggled into her bed (she’s younger and smaller than me) and coloured everything the way she showed me
V is just relieved, that Jackie made it and probably helps out himself more than Jackie, with cuddling

reblog.comment:

Because of painkillers she wasn’t really able to draw so I snuggled into her bed (she’s younger and smaller than me) and coloured everything the way she showed me

summary: CYBERPUNK 2077 NO TENDRÁ SISTEMA DE MORAL, PERO SÍ PODRÁS TENER VARIOS ROMANCES #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos...
title: CYBERPUNK 2077 NO TENDRÁ SISTEMA DE MORAL, PERO SÍ PODRÁS TENER VARIOS ROMANCES #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Juegos #CYBERPUNK2077
body:
CYBERPUNK 2077 NO TENDRÁ SISTEMA DE MORAL, PERO SÍ PODRÁS TENER VARIOS ROMANCES #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Juegos #CYBERPUNK2077

Algo que ha caracterizado a los juegos de RPG de las últimas generaciones, han sido las opciones morales en las que tenemos la opción de elegir un camino correcto o uno corrupto, lo cual en la mayoría de las ocasiones cambia la percepción de personajes en nuestra aventura. En Cyberpunk 2077 no habrá un sistema así, pero sí habrá opciones de romance con varios personajes.

El próximo juego del…

summary: Free Cyberpunk 2077 “Mercenary of the Dark Future” PS4 Theme is Available Now
title: Free Cyberpunk 2077 “Mercenary of the Dark Future” PS4 Theme is Available Now
body:
Free Cyberpunk 2077 “Mercenary of the Dark Future” PS4 Theme is Available Now

If you’re anticipating Cyberpunk 2077as much as I am right now, then you can head over to the PlayStation Store and download a free theme right now. Even though it’s a static theme, it looks pretty cool and includes a dark music track and some sound effects when scrolling through the different apps. You can check it out below as well as click on the image to go straight to the theme on the…

blog.name: cyberpunk-thot
blog.title: Is NiCola ok Instead?
blog.description:
Dex || Gay || 25 || UK

Jackie Welles is my husband.

tags: Jackie you keep your jock friends away from Vs gf!
summary: Imagine V having a girlfriend the Valentinos are after and Jackie secretly tries to keep his gang members away from V and it...
question: Imagine V having a girlfriend the Valentinos are after and Jackie secretly tries to keep his gang members away from V and it appears like he was after that girl too, which leaves V to be very annoyed and suspicious and confused
answer:
Jackie is just trying to keep his gang away but there’s a huge misunderstanding!!!

V would be a lil mad but I’m sure if Jackie explains himself then V would understand.

They are best bros afterall.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 podría tener New Game Plus
title: Cyberpunk 2077 podría tener New Game Plus
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 podría tener #NewGamePlus

Con Cyberpunk 2077 ahora a menos de un año del lanzamiento, los detalles al respecto están empezando a aparecer de manera rápida y exhaustiva. Pero una pregunta vital que sigue sin respuesta es: ¿habrá un Nuevo Game Plus? Bueno, aunque los desarrolladores de CD Projekt RED aún no lo han confirmado oficialmente, está empezando a ser muy probable. 

Cyberpunk 2077 no tendrá un sistema de moralidad

E…
